data.name: Snowball Saves Summer - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The complete soundtrack for the 2D physics platformer Snowball Saves Summer.

Contains 21 tracks in 128kbps mp3 format for a total duration of 24 minutes 57 seconds.

Tracklist:

01. Title (0:46)
02. Overworld (1:29)
03. Athletic (1:42)
04. Underworld (1:26)
05. Underwater (2:24)
06. Action (1:00)
07. Toy Factory (1:51)
08. Mountain (1:47)
09. Krampusland (1:49)
10. Fortress (1:45)
11. Boss (1:21)
12. Ice Map (0:22)
13. Water Map (0:22)
14. Toy Map (0:22)
15. Mountain Map (0:22)
16. Krampusland Map (0:22)
17. Death (0:05)
18. Victory (0:05)
19. Krampus (1:50)
20. Credits (2:32)
21. Energetic (1:08) (unused track)

data.short_description: Complete soundtrack for the 2D physics platformer Snowball Saves Summer.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2+, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 2.3GHz or above
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2+, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7 2.6GHz or above
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960M
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11+
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 2.3GHz or above
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 25 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 2.3GHz or above
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
